description.fr:
À mon réveil, je me suis retrouvée dans un lieu inconnu.
Mon seul repère dans ce chaos était mon téléphone portable.

Pour retrouver mes souvenirs et rentrer chez moi, je dois accumuler des points d’affection auprès des personnages cibles et atteindre une fin spéciale.

J’ai donc commencé à interagir avec eux et à remplir peu à peu leurs jauges d’affection. Tout semblait se dérouler sans encombre... Jusqu’à l’arrivée d’une nouvelle notification.

« Le nombre maximum de points d’affection par cible est de 5.
Au-delà de 6, l’état 'Overheat' (surchauffe) s’active, augmentant drastiquement le risque de déboucher sur une fin tragique. »

'Tout à l’heure… il avait combien de cœurs déjà ?'

Alors que j’essayais de vérifier la fenêtre du système, des bruits de pas se rapprochèrent.

« Un personnage cible se trouve à proximité. »

Je voulais fuir immédiatement. Mais…

▷ Points d’affection à votre égard : ♥♥♡♥♡♥♡♥
(Ils sont amoureux de vous. Où que vous soyez, ils feront tout pour vous retrouver.)

altTitles.ja: ダイヤモンドの功罪

description.en: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja: Ｙｅｓ！　プリキュア５

description.en: Nozomi Yumehara, a regular student, finds a magical book called the Dream Collet in the library and meets Coco and Nuts, two creatures from the Palmier Kingdom. They plead with Nozomi to restore their world, which has been destroyed by an organization called the Nightmares. By completing the Dream Collet and finding the 55 Pinkies, they can make any wish come true. Meanwhile, the Nightmares are moving into the real world. When Nozomi agrees to help, she transforms into the magical girl Cure Dream and joins four fellow students to form a team of Pretty Cures.

[Idle Nomad version]
Low-grade guide Qin Yun thought his assignment on Planet G would be uneventful—until he met Cezar, an eccentric esper with too much power and even more curiosity to spare. Left with a temporary mark, Qin Yun was stuck with being dragged across the galaxy, and dodging danger all while enduring Cezar’s unpredictable whims. This is only temporary, right?

[1Braincell version]
Low-grade guide, Qin Yun, forcibly marked by divine-grade sentry tyrant Mersherie, aggressive maiden-heart seme x serious straightforward uke starting an unbashful unabashed companion life, conquering the whole universe while at it

A boy named Ryuuji Aizawa is getting treated by his gyaru classmates like he wasn't there, like this girl named Nana Aino who sits on his seat. With him still in it.

description.es-la: Un par de gals parecen no notar al chico delante de ellas.

altTitles.ja: 魔性の乙女の役廻り

altTitles.en: The Role of the Femme Fatale

description.en: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
description.ja: 私立廻蘭女学院中学。そこは孤児院出身の子どもたちのみが通う、歴史と伝統ある寄宿学校。この学校には古くから、生徒たちへ個々の目標に沿った【役柄】を与えるという特殊な制度があった。心優しい少女・志村花子は「学校中のみんなと友達になる」ことを目標に入学すると、いきなりとんでもない課題を与えられてしまい――！？クセ強めなクラスメイトたちに囲まれて「愛人作り」はできるのか！？

description.en: Hyeondo and Yumin, an ordinary man and woman in their 30s, break up with their respective partners for different reasons despite still being in love with them. Selfishly hoping to get their old flames back, the two form a plan. They pretend to date each other in hopes of provoking their former lovers. Will their selfish and foolish plan really work?

altTitles.ja: ボールパークでつかまえて！

description.en: An office drone finds relief from his job by attending the ballpark close to his daily commute. He asks a vendor girl for a beer, but for some reason, after the transaction she sticks around him…
description.ja:
「お兄さん、私のことタイプなんだ～？」

ある日の球場で、ギャルなビール売り子に絡まれた!?でもこの子、実は超絶ウブな純情ガールで……。舞台は、とあるプロ野球の球場（ボールパーク）！日々たくさんの人が集まり、働き、笑い合い、人間ドラマが生まれるこの場所は、まるで一つの「町」のよう！

実は超純情なビール売り子のギャル・ルリコ。ビール売り子に憧れる弁当屋の看板娘・山田ちゃん。ピークを過ぎたベテラン選手・コジローと、お忍びで観戦に来ている妻のユキ。球場警備員歴30年の渋い男・イガさん。日本に馴染めない元メジャーリーガーのデニスなどなど、個性豊かな「住人」たちが繰り広げる、読めばきっと元気になる球場コメディ♪

さあ、あなたもボールパークへ遊びに来ませんか！？

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

title.en: Maou-sama no Mou Approach ga Overkill Sugimasu

altTitles.ja: 魔王様の猛アプローチが オーバーキルすぎます

description.en:
24-hour surveillance of ex-lover's activities.

A handsome demon king and an unlucky hero from a previous life.

Despite his bad luck, Yuuki Yuta lives an ordinary life. One day, a handsome transfer student, Mazaki Rei, arrives at Yuta's school. Although it should be their first meeting, Rei's sense of distance from the very first day is a bit strange.

When Yuta asks him why, he learns that Rei is the Demon King and that Yuta was a former hero in his previous life, And they were even lovers...!

Until Yuta's curse is lifted, he and the Demon King begin a 24-hour, indefinite life of surveillance!
Short manga posted by Imo Ichirou [@cheesesama24] on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 魔王様、リトライ! R

description.en: At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world. His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils. A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.
description.ja: ダンジョンの最下層部にて、この世界の創造主と思しき存在を目の当たりにした魔王が、次に向かう先は大悪魔たちが群雄割拠する魔族領。底抜けに明るい元気っ娘・JKも新たに仲間に加わり、今回も濃厚すぎるキャラたちの個性がぶつかり合う。
description.pt-br: Entrando em uma nova série! A aventura do lorde demônio mais forte está longe de terminar. No andar mais baixo da masmorra, o Lorde Demônio ficou cara a cara com uma presença que parece ser a criadora deste mundo. Seu próximo destino é o território demoníaco, onde há uma rivalidade contínua entre demônios. Uma nova, incrivelmente enérgica e alegre colegial se juntou à gangue. Mais uma vez, as personalidades agitadas do nosso personagem e suas idiossincrasias irão colidir umas com as outras. A aguardada sequência cômica de uma adaptação em quadrinhos da fantasia popular, cheia de mal-entendidos!

title.en: Gun-Ota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem wo Tsukucchaimashita!?

altTitles.ja: 軍オタが魔法世界に転生したら、現代兵器で軍隊ハーレムを作っちゃいました？！

altTitles.ja-ro: Gunota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei Shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem o Tsukucchaimashita!?

altTitles.en: When a Gun Nerd Is Reincarnated to a World of Magic, He Established a Harem army with Modern Weapons!?

altTitles.ko: 군대 오타쿠가 마법세계에 환생하여 현대병기로 군할렘을 만들어 버렸습니다!

altTitles.zh: 军武宅转生魔法世界，靠现代武器开军队后宫！？

altTitles.zh-hk: 軍武宅轉生魔法世界，靠現代武器開軍隊後宮!?

altTitles.fr: Quand un fan d'arme est réincarné dans un monde de magie, il établi un Harem avec des armes modernes ?!

altTitles.ru: Когда фанат пушек попал в мир магии, он собрал гарем, вооруженный современным оружием

altTitles.th: กันโอตะได้กลับชาติมาเกิดใหม่ในโลกที่มีเวทมนตร์ เล่ม!?

description.en: Hotta Youta is killed while returning home from work on a cold evening. He wakes up being carried by a bunny-eared woman.
description.ja: 命を落とし、異世界に転生したミリオタ少年は、知識を活かして兵器を製造して戦うことに！前世で叶わなかった想いを胸に、迫り来る魔物から人々を守れ!!! その力で、少年は伝説になる！――かもしれない。
description.pt:
Hotta Youta foi morto enquanto voltava para casa do trabalho em uma noite fria. Ele acordou sendo carregado por uma mulher com orelhas de coelho! Apresentando a reencarnação, armas e harém, é uma história de armas e magia que dá ao nosso protagonista uma nova vida… e um novo começo!   
*Adaptado da web/light novel de mesmo nome.*  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yametakashi)

altTitles.ja: 鵺の陰陽師

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

title.en: Tensei Shitara Dragon no Tamago Datta ~Ibara no Dragon Road~

altTitles.ja: 転生したらドラゴンの卵だった ～イバラのドラゴンロード

altTitles.en: Reincarnated as a Dragon Egg: Thorny Road of a Dragon

altTitles.ru: Перерождение в яйцо дракона: Я стану сильнейшим

altTitles.zh: 轉生之後的我變成了龍蛋 ～目標乃是世界最強～

description.en:
Our hero wakes up one day in a brand new world... but his new life doesn’t come with fighting skills or magic powers, or even arms and legs! He’s reborn as a helpless egg, stuck in an unfamiliar forest surrounded by terrifying, hungry beasts. 

But eggs hatch, hatchlings grow up, and humble beginnings can lead to something great. He’ll do his best to become the strongest dragon ever, and no measly shell will get in his way!
description.ja: ある朝目覚めたら、なぜか森の中にいて体が卵に…これが転生!?　訳もわからないまま襲ってくる怪物と戦って、レベルアップでドラゴンに進化!!　ガンガン強くなって強敵たちとバトル！ だけど人間が恋しい…。
description.ru: Главный герой перерождается в яйцо дракона, и навязчивый голос в голове молвит ему: «Давай становиться сильнее!»

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
プレイヤー

Through posting a "Best Comment", I somehow became the main character of a webtoon!

description.fr:
Seoljin est un vrai loser à l'école : il est méprisé par tous, même par ceux qu'il croyait être ses amis. La seule chose qu'il puisse faire pour échapper à cette dure réalité, c'est de lire des webtoons d'action, de s'imaginer à la place des héros qui se battent courageusement contre leurs adversaires, sans la moindre hésitation. Mais la vie de Seoljin va prendre un tout autre tournant lorsqu'il laissera un petit commentaire sur le webtoon "Player" : un commentaire qui, bientôt, le conduira dans l'univers-même de ce webtoon !

---

description.zh:
弱鸡少年穿越到漫画世界！
打败NO.1才能回到现实？
内向的男主许镇是学校里的边缘人物。作为一个漫画迷，某天他看到一部漫画，却很反感故事里主角先被强者碾压再崛起的老套设定。于是在评论中留言吐槽并许下了“承诺”，没想到这条评论成为了热评第一。之后不可思议的事情发生了！他竟被漫画里的“神——亚瑟”带进了漫画世界！并且只有当他代替漫画世界里的主角成为所谓的“player排行No.1”，他才能回到现实世界。菜鸟玩家该如何成为最强玩家呢？

description.pt-br: Depois de postar um “Melhor Comentário”, de alguma forma eu me tornei o personagem principal de uma webtoon!

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼ライジングサン   F I N A L S

altTitles.vi: Đội trưởng Tsubasa - Mặt trời mọc - Chung kết

description.en:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.

altTitles.en: Captain Tsubasa: Road to 2002 - Go for 2006

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

title.en: I'm an Elite Angel, but I'm Troubled by an Impregnable JK!

altTitles.ja: 私、エリート天使ですが難攻不落なJKに困ってます！

altTitles.en: I'm an Elite Angel, but I'm Troubled by an Impregnable High School Girl!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi, Elite Tenshi desu ga Nankoufuraku na JK ni Komattemasu!

description.en: The role of angels is to evaluate the good deeds performed by humans and grant them "small wishes" in return. Ariel is one of these angels. However, what appeared in front of her was a high school girl who didn't have a "small wish" despite having performed over 10,000 good deeds. Ariel tries to approach this high school girl, and then… Angel (♀) × JK (♀) a somewhat naughtly slapstick romantic comedy ♡
description.ja:
天使たちの役目は、人間の善行を評価し、その善行にあった「小さな願い」を叶えること。天使・アリエルもその役目を担う一人であった。しかし、目の前に現れたのは、数万もの善行を重ねているにも関わらず「小さな願い」のひとつも見えない女子高生で？

接触を試みるアリエルに、迫るＪＫ……
「わたしと、シてみる？」――――――――!?!?

title.en: Shinmai Necromancer, Maou wo Sosei suru

altTitles.en: The Novice Necromancer Who Resurrected the Demon King

altTitles.ja: 新米ネクロマンサー、魔王を蘇生する。

altTitles.id: Sang Nekromanser Pemula yang Membangkitkan Raja Iblis

description.en:
"O spirit destined to be mine, rise once more from the realm of the dead!"

In the depths of an extravagant tomb, Alice, a novice necromancer, channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air, and a wave of overwhelming mana surged, leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expected—it was a handsome young man, casually perched atop the coffin, his piercing gaze meeting hers.

With a bright, disarming smile, he introduced himself—but Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who, centuries ago, had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.

title.en: Falling in the Night with You

altTitles.en: Fall in the Night with You

description.en:
The sudden appearance of the amnesiac witch, Nyx, has brought a lot of changes to Ren Xi’s life. The two help each other’s growth, Ren Xi’s willing to help Nyx to find her lost memories, but in the process, will discover an astonishing secret……  
  
L'apparition soudaine d'une sorcière amnésique, Nix, amène beaucoup de changements dans la vie du jeune Ren Xi. Ren Xi veut aider Nix à retrouver ses souvenirs. Cette quête leur fera découvrir un secret incroyable…

altTitles.ja: 魔女は満月に咲く

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

altTitles.ja: ヴィンランド・サガ

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

altTitles.ja: エレキシード

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

description.es:
Jiwoo es un joven amable que utiliza sus reflejos increíblemente rápidos, como los de un gato, para hacer del mundo un mejor lugar salvando niños o mascotas. Kayden es un agente secreto prófugo que termina encerrado en el cuerpo de un... mmm... gato gordo, peludo y viejo. Juntos y con la ayuda de los superpoderes de Jiwoo y la inteligencia de Kayden lucharán contra las fuerzas que desean que el mal tome control del mundo. Aunque solo lo lograrán si consiguen soportarse lo suficiente para hacerlo.

Kayden est un agent secret fugitif qui finit par être enfermé dans le corps d'un... euh... vieux, gros chat tout poilu. Ensemble, et équipés des superpouvoirs de Jiwoo et de l'intelligence de Kayden, ils lutteront contre les forces obscures qui veulent que le mal domine le monde... mais seulement s'ils arrivent à bien s'entendre !

description.ru:
Кайден - загадочный человек, который словно комета спустился с неба. Весь израненный, почти потерявший последние силы, он решает скрыть свое присутствие - ведь по-другому от погони не уйти. По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. Один раз по пути домой он встречает до боли потрепанного кота и берет его к себе домой. Наш У не только добрый, но еще и обладает одной скрытой способностью. Какой же?

Ji-U é um jovem de bom coração que aproveita os reflexos rápidos de um gato para secretamente tornar o mundo um lugar melhor - uma criança salva ou um animal de estimação adotivo de cada vez. Kayden é um agente secreto em fuga, que se encontra preso no corpo de um... hum... decididamente gordo velho gato fofo. Juntos, armados com os superpoderes de Ji-U e a super inteligência de Kayden, eles estão prontos para lutar contra as forças que deixariam o mal governar este mundo. Isto é, se eles aguentarem um ao outro tempo suficiente para fazer o trabalho.

altTitles.ja: 異世界サムライ

description.en:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
description.ja:
戦国時代最強の剣豪、異世界転移。

戦国時代末期、最強の剣豪・ギンコは常に、自分より強いものとの死闘に飢えていた。切って切って切りまくり、ついにこの世に自分以上の強者がいないと絶望した矢先、異世界へ転移！　目の前には――ドラゴン！？
description.pt-br:
A espadachim mais forte do período dos Reinos Combatentes, transferida para outro mundo.

No final do Período dos Reinos Combatentes, Ginko, a maior espadachim da época, estava sempre ansiosa por lutar até a morte com alguém mais forte que ela. Depois de cortar e cortar e cortar, ela finalmente se desespera porque não há ninguém mais forte do que ela neste mundo, e então ela é transferida para outro mundo! Diante de seus olhos está um dragão!

altTitles.ja: 目つき悪い子かわいい子

altTitles.en: A Cute Girl With A Nasty Look
A Cute Girl With Nasty Look

altTitles.vi: A cute girl with nasty look

description.en:
This delinquent is stupid cute!

High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!!

Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes!

(Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox)

A twitter short by @hamita1220
description.vi: Cô gái du côn này thật là ngốc nghếch và đáng yêu! Học sinh trung học Tanaka-kun tin rằng những cô gái đáng sợ như vậy thực sự rất dễ thương. Vì vậy, ngồi cạnh Mizuno-san, một người bị coi là một kẻ du côn, cậu ấy đã cố gắng làm thân với cô ấy. Tuy nhiên, ngoài biểu cảm đáng sợ, cô ấy còn có rất nhiều tin đồn !! Mặc dù ban đầu nhận được một cái nhìn lạnh lùng, nhưng sự cố gắng của Tanaka đã mở ra trái tim của Mizuno từng chút một. Nhưng kế hoạch của Tanaka để giúp cô hòa nhập với các bạn cùng lớp trong lễ hội trường đang bị đe dọa khi thảm họa ập đến!
description.es-la:
Esta delincuente es estúpida y linda!

El estudiante Tanaka-kun cree que las chicas aterradoras son en realidad lindas. Y así, sentandose al lado de la delincuente Mizuno-san intenta hacerse más cercano a ella. Además de tener una cara aterradora, ella es el sujeto de muchos rumores y temida por sus compañeros!!

Apesar de recibir la ley del hielo al principio, la ofensiva de Tanaka abre poco a poco el corazón de Mizuno-san. Pero el plan de Tanaka para ayudarla a encajar con sus compañeros durante el festival escolar, es amenazado por un ataque sin aviso!

title.en: There's Something Wrong About My Man's Morals

altTitles.en: My Lover's Personality Is a Little Strange

description.en: After a fateful encounter as children, Evonne and the outcast prince, Theo, can’t deny their deep connection. However, their lives are torn apart when Evonne’s family is wrongly accused of treason, leading to their ruin. Cursed and forced to disguise herself as a man, Evonne struggles to survive until Theo finally finds her and uses all his power as emperor to take her with him. Together, they’ll start a journey facing challenges that’ll test their love as they try to start a life together.

description.vi: Một câu chuyện kể về một cô hầu gái, Meika, người không thể kìm nén hoàn toàn tình cảm của mình dành cho chủ nhân của cô ấy, Kouta.
description.es-la: Una serialización del webcomic sobre una maid, Meika, quien no puede reprimir por completo sus sentimientos por su amo, Kouta.
description.pt-br: A serialização da webcomic sobre uma empregada, Meika, que não consegue ocultar completamente seus sentimentos pelo seu mestre, Kouta.

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

description.en:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.
description.ru: У Карабоши Харуки нет ничего, что выделяло бы его из толпы, и поэтому он решил стать авантюристом, желая "отличиться". Однажды под его домом на Хоккайдо появилось подземелье. По случайному совпадению, он нашёл так называемую "панель навыков", в которой он может распределять специальные очки для увеличения скорости прокачки. Сможет ли Харуки стать популярным человеком, одержимо посещая своё "домашнее подземелье" каждый день?
description.pt-br:
Karaboshi Haruki não tem presença, tanto quanto pode ser reconhecido, então ele se tornou um aventureiro com apenas o desejo de "se destacar". Um dia, uma masmorra apareceu sob sua casa em Hokkaido. Coincidentemente, ele pegou um "Skill Board" com o qual pode gastar pontos de habilidade para aumentar sua taxa de crescimento. É possível se tornar uma pessoa popular mergulhando obsessivamente na masmorra de sua casa todos os dias?
  
Baseado no popular romance de fantasia Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer", vencedor do 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja: 罪と罰のスピカ

altTitles.vi: Spica, Hình Phạt và Tội Ác

description.en: Hatori, a high school teacher leading an ordinary life, notices one day that his student, Spica Tsumugi, is being bullied. On a rainy day after school, Hatori finds himself alone with Tsumugi by chance. Hatori tells her, "I'll do something about it!" but Tsumugi gently takes his hand and says with a smile, "Hatori-sensei, you're such a liar." Teacher and student... two people who should not get too close. This somewhat bewitching girl will dramatically change Hatori's ordinary life.
description.ja: 最も無垢で、最も罪深い。世界はこんなヒロインを待っていたーー。
description.vi:
Câu chuyện xoay quanh Hatori, một giáo viên tại trường cấp 3 và là người có cuộc sống rất đỗi bình thường. Một ngày nọ, anh nhận ra rằng học sinh mà mình chủ nhiệm, Tsumugi Spica đang bị bạn cùng lớp bắt nạt.
Những tưởng đây chỉ là một cô bé nhút nhát, nhưng...

description.en:
For generations the Torqye Pashalu and the Balt-Rhein Empire have stood in stern opposition of each other. Then one night, when an Imperial minister is found assassinated, the two nations are plunged into a potentially explosive situation. As the generals of Torqye's council cry for war, Mahmut comes to discover the devious truth behind the assassination. Thus the young pasha's battle for his country and peace and trust in his fellow man begins…  

---

**Notes:**

altTitles.ja: 氷の城壁

description.en:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

altTitles.ja: 今日もベランダで

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

title.en: Saegusa-san wa Megane-senpai to Koi o Egaku

altTitles.ja: 三枝さんはメガネ先輩と恋を描く

description.en: Saegusa-san is a cool lone wolf who in reality is asocial, a downer, and overall sucks at interacting with others. But she harbors a secret. She’s actually going out with her senior, referred to by everyone as Glasses-Senpai. In order to close the gap between them, every day Saegusa-san puts herself on the line (in more ways than one!) On the other hand, Glasses-Senpai is agonized over Saegusa-san's unintentional sex appeal. If he is Saegusa-san's first boyfriend, then she is his first girlfriend, and neither of them have any clue about how far they should go! Where will this romance end up?!
description.ja: クールで一匹オオカミな女の子・三枝さん。だけど本当は人と関わるのが苦手な陰キャ＆ややダウナー系な女子。そんな彼女にはある秘密が。それは先輩のメガネ先輩と付き合っていること――。彼との距離を埋めるために、今日も三枝さんは頑張って体を張る（いろんな意味で）のだが…!?一方メガネ先輩は三枝さんの無自覚SE●アピールに悶々しっぱなし。三枝さんも初彼なら、メガネ先輩も初彼女。どこまで手を出していいか分からず、戸惑うばかり!! 果たして、二人の恋の行方は――!!?

altTitles.ja: ディー・グレイマン

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

title.en: Asa Okitara Onnanoko ni Natteta Manga

altTitles.en: I woke up one morning as a girl Manga

altTitles.zh-hk: 早上起來變成了女孩子

altTitles.zh: 早上起来变成了女孩子

altTitles.ja: 朝起きたら女の子になってた漫画

description.en: A man wakes up one morning to find out he is now a girl - and he also now has a sister.

altTitles.ja: コロニカの脳

description.en: Zero grew up in an orphanage. Contrary to the orphanage's philosophy of "If you want it, believe in and fight for it," Zero hates competition and conflict and prefers peaceful days. However, after discovering a certain secret, Zero finds himself caught up in the whirlpool of a cruel fate...!?

altTitles.ja: ふたり生徒会

description.en:
What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

description.en:
Cha Iseul is a girl who, without money, is like a lifeless body. She indulges in a depraved lifestyle.

But one day, her card is confiscated, and she faces the threat of being kicked out of the house. At that moment, a mysterious woman named Sori appears in front of Iseul. "Madam, do you really not remember me?"
description.es-la: Cha Iseul es una chica que nació en cuna de oro. Dedicaba sus días a entregarse a los placeres de la bebida, el sexo y el despilfarro de dinero, hasta que su madre le quitó la tarjeta de crédito y decidió no darle ni un centavo más. En plena crisis conoce a Kang Sori, una chica de cabello despeinado y aspecto pasado de moda que parece ser todo lo contrario a ella...
